host.name: www.hewlett.org
host.comment: transaction-type is called activity-type so transaction analysis not available

host.name: www.maec.es
host.comment:
currency code eur is lower case or mixed case - sb EUR - pipeline converts to uppercase participating-org/@ref are not OrganisationIdentifiers, nor is “Spain”
participating-org/@roles do not conform to the coding list esp “funding” not “Funding” - (this is where the choice in the schema to have some numeric codes, some alpha really bites) recipient-country/code - some are invalid eg. NES ? ,ARM (Aremia) - using 3-character codes some sector codes are not in sector lists some region codes are not in region list
unusable in present state

host.name: www.minbuza.nl
host.comment: download url refers to a zip file http://www.iatiregistry.org/dataset/minbuza_nl-activities unable to be loaded

host.name: www.unops.org
host.comment: participant-org[@role=”Funding”] is missing so no funder facet analysis

host.name: siteresources.worldbank.org
host.comment: some downloads are not well-formed XML - http://siteresources.worldbank.org/IATI/WB-298.xml
